artist: Designer: William Gray Purcell; Designer: George Grant Elmslie
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George R.A. Johnson, Mr. and Mrs. Nicholas G.A. Johnson, and Mr. and Mrs. Charles R.E. Johnson
description: leaded glass window with linear designs; green, blue, orange and white small colored bars and squares in a frame design around clear glass grid; "crackle" effect clear glass bars around border; handle and hinges attached
dimension: 51 x 26 x 3 3/4 in. (129.54 x 66.04 x 9.53 cm) (including hardware)
markings:
Tag and Stickers

on glass: Christie\'s sticker; on handle: two Christie\'s tags and red tag
title: Window, from the Decker House
